name: intensity due
description:
It's called 'Wanted' and that's the title and concept behind the game.
We want to bring a new touch to players who use their mobile devices, even when the application is in a different country. We also see this as good for our customers which in turn increases the value we provide to them. To take the idea of 'Wanted' further we have created a website to show the game and play it in full HD on your Android device, with WP7 and higher compatible devices. We are planning on Raidou Namikawa, the creator of 'Wanted', to be our Executive Producer, but ideally with a mix of experienced and young development talent. So, we are eager to hear your feedback and you can ask us your questions on our website and email us at info@yoichuismedia.com. If you are ready to download 'Wanted' and enjoy yourself you can download it from the Google Play store for free. Please feel free to follow us on Twitter @yoichuismedia and on Facebook.
